# Baekmuk Fonts

This is a set of Korean TrueType fonts as provided at

- http://kldp.net/baekmuk/

## Contents

This bundle consists of four Korean fonts:

- batang.ttf: serif
- dotum.ttf: sans-serif
- gulim.ttf: sans-serif (rounded)
- hline.ttf: headline
